title: GOP Voters Tell Lawmakers to Stick With Trump
text:
BLAINE, Minn.—Republican Rep. Tom Emmer’s opposition to the House impeachment probe fueled a heated town hall meeting here Tuesday, with Democrats urging him to stand up to the president while the three-term congressman blamed them for looking for a reason to attack Mr. Trump.

Mr. Emmer’s steadfastness reinforced his standing with Leander Wetter, a lifelong Republican who was in the minority at the event despite the president’s 25% margin of victory in this district in 2016. “There are allegations brought against him that...
description: At town-hall gatherings with GOP members of Congress, Republicans criticize the impeachment probe but Democrats press their representatives to back the investigation.
